name: ELENA

description.short: Minimalist regal ballgown with premium matte satin and functional pockets.
description.full:
Pricing & Availability

  • For Sale: ₱15,500
  • Open for Rental (Shop display)
  • Made to Rent available

Details

  • Style: Minimalist Regal Ballgown
  • Fabric: Premium Matte Satin
  • Color: Sophisticated Ivory
  • Design: Timeless and structured
  • Size: Medium to Large (Onhand)

Features

  • Sweetheart neckline with elegant pleated off-shoulder sleeves.
  • Structured corset bodice that provides a clean, tailored silhouette.
  • Full box-pleated ballgown skirt with a dramatic 1.5m trail.
  • Functional side pockets—the perfect modern detail for every bride.
  • Adjustable back to accommodate Medium to Large frames comfortably.

priceMessage: Message us on Facebook for the rental price or to book your fitting schedule!
